/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/cc  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.0.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/OpenGLProject.dir/glad/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLProject.dir/src/main.c.o -o OpenGLProject  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib -framework OpenGL -framework OpenGL /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.3.4.dylib -lm
